sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form';
import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col';
import InfoCard from './InfoCard';
import styled from 'styled-components';



const ButtonText = styled.span`
    margin-left: 10px;
`

const SubmitButton = styled(Button)`
    display:flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 10px;
`

const Experience = ({title, employer, startDate, endDate, description, onChange}) => {
    return (
        <InfoCard title={'Tidigare erfarenheter'}>
            <Form.Row>
                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="title">
                    <Form.Label>Titel</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control type="text" onChange={onChange} defaultValue={title}/>
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="employer">
                    <Form.Label>Arbetsgivare</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onChange}  defaultValue={employer}/>
                </Form.Group>
            </Form.Row>

            <Form.Row>
                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="startDate">
                    <Form.Label>Start</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onChange} type="date" defaultValue={startDate}/>
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group as={Col} controlId="endDate">
                    <Form.Label>Slut</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control onChange={onChange} type="date" defaultValue={endDate}/>
                </Form.Group>
            </Form.Row>

            <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlTextarea1">
                <Form.Label>Beskrivning</Form.Label>
                <Form.Control onChange={onChange} as="textarea" rows="4" defaultValue={description}/>
            </Form.Group>
        </InfoCard>
    )
}



export default Experience
